Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 97-599.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 367.
Placed on Consent Calendar No: 34.
Called up by House on Call of Consent Calendar.
Passed House by Unanimous Consent.

Presented to President.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation
Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to designate certain national wildlife refuge lands.

summary.text: Designates national wildlife refuge lands known as North Cudjoe Key in Florida as the Florida Keys Wilderness. Removes national wildlife refuge lands known as Raccoon Key in Florida from the National Wilderness Preservation System.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain national wildlife refuge lands.
